title: Had 5G speed plummet from 400mbps down…
text: With just one device connected 4G+ speed 90mbps down to 40mbps and 5G speed plummet from 400mbps down to 40mbps. ping 220+ in USA, 80 at home UK when using nord, which significantly decreases by half when not connected to VPN. Online chat took me through troubleshooting whilst insisting I should only experience a 30% drop in speed but nothing worked even after un/reinstall and was dismissed as no further action could be taken and was informed that it was my ISP doing the throttling.  Shop around.

title: Very Slow
text: Very Slow - avoid this company Recently signed up after changing from another large vpn provider, but nord's connections are much, much slower than the other provider. I should have read more reviews before I decided to try these guys. Now that I'm trying to get a refund, as I'm within 30 days, they are extremely slow to help and answer my questions. I'm sure they will be very helpful and understanding and quick to respond to this post - got to save face on a public site.

title: Underwhelming service and functionality
text: I have been using the service for about 3 months. Generally it works OK but compared to the Torguard service I used in the past I'm pretty disappointed with the customer service. They were unable to help me getting my Windows pc working as a wireless vpn access point and I recently discovered that there is no wireguard functionality available for my router... So I am not really impressed thus far

title: I can't wait to switch VPNs
text: I can't wait to switch VPNs. Every time my PC automatically updates in the background, my Nord VPN stops working, and there is no notification that it has stopped working. After seeing the icon is no longer on the bottom, I then have to open the app and log in again, which is a long process that takes 5 to 10 minutes and always comes with several failed attempts. This adds up to a lot of wasted time. I have Nord VPN in my Start Up Apps, so when my computer restarts after an update, the VPN should also restart. I also see the price goes way up upon renewal, and I'm seeing better options.

title: Horrible
text: Horrible.   Beware!!   I signed up and after multiple attempts, was not able to connect to the internet when Nord was enabled.   I even restarted my computer several times, and was still not able to connect to the internet when connected to NORD.    Disappointed, I initiated a chat with support to close my account and get a refund.  The rep kept trying to hard sell me into staying, evading my multiple requests to please close the account and refund my credit card.   I literally had to ask 5 times before I began to demand in caps that they just close the account and issued a refund.   After my 7th (yes, 7th!!) request, the rep finally agreed to refund my money.

title: Ordered clothing but over a month and a…
text: Ordered clothing but over a month and a half still have not received.  The company says it has been delivered but all they have s sent is a piece of costume jewelry.

title: Nightmare to try and connect
text: Nightmare to try and connect. Have to restart my laptop every time. Mainly got nord because apparently Netflix can’t detect it and I wanted to watch shows on USA and Mexico Netflix but it noticed and I got booted off. Glad I only got the bottom tier for one month instead of the year deal

title: Very good but expensiv
text: NordVPN is very usefull and a must have for all ppl, who want to play, work or watch some movies. You´re able to switch the countrys with the best connection and protection. It´s a little bit expensiv but quality is expensiv so it´s okay.

title: Very Good Customer Support
text: I could not get this product to work as it was confusing swapping between Windows and UBUNTU (using terminal commands). I even tried twice. The reason for the 4 stars is there was NO quibble in obtaining a refund. It was back in my account within 5 days! Very good customer support! I suggest you backup the LINUX system first.

title: I HAVE NO IDEA OF WHETHER THE VPN IS…
text: I HAVE NO IDEA OF WHETHER THE VPN IS WORKING OR NOT. SOMETIMES IT SAYS IT IS ON BUT THEN I'M TOLD THAT I HAVE NO PROTECTION. I WISH I COULD REDO THE WHOLE THING AND NOT GET INVOLVED WITH NORD.

title: Beware of early charges!
text: My subscription was due to renew on the 15th of January when, to my total surprise, I saw my bank account short by £100 today!! I immediately contacted chat support who instead of refund me on the spot, the first tried to promote the benefits of my subscription if they kept the amount taken without consent. When I asked for the reason why they had taken the amount almost 15 days before renewal, the reply was "We enabled early charges so to ensure that you can use our services continuously"!! I am always aware of all my direct debits and the fact that I was not even reminded through email about it (checked my junk mail as well) is completely outrageous! Now my money taken will take up to 10 working days to be returned.

title: The most-well known, but for good reasons
text: It might be well-known because partnerships on Youtube, but when you use NordVPN on a regular basis you understand fast why. The price is definitely fair for such a high quality of servvice (in 3 years I had never slow connections nor interruptions) The support is highly qualified : I had 2 inquiries, one of them was about the configuration on the FireTV app and was somehow technical, no problem. The 2nd one was about the Multifactor Auth (MFA) ; this was solved in a really timely matter (thanks @Cleetus :-) Definitely worth it!

title: its good when it connects
text: its good when it connects. Myself and others have the same issues. Having to use legacy login, uninstall and reinstall, cant connect, server doesnt exist,and of course my favorite reset the password. Oh and pro tip, you really should just connect your customer to a supervisor if they ask for one. There is no point in trying to be super tech. If the customer is over your attempts, pass them along. Oh and I dont have all day to sit with a cocky tech telling me that they can fix it instead of getting a supervisor.

title: I purchased Nordvpn though Quidco and…
text: I purchased Nordvpn though Quidco and never got my cashback. I canceled the service, as I never used it in 2021. They have now taken payment of £101 for a service I canceled. NordVPN are refunding the £101 payment, but saying I broke their T&C's on the original cancellation.

title: Didn't really work for what I needed…
text: Didn't really work for what I needed (travelling abroad). Certain hotels and all airport WiFi were impossible to connect to with the VPN running. This, in my view, is a major flaw in the software. Users should not be expected to have the technical knowledge to identify and implement workarounds.

title: Very helpful and quick support
text: I reached out to Nord's support team for assistance with dedicated IP transfer, and my agent, Amelia, was very helpful with getting that process resolved quickly and painlessly. Very thankful for the help!

title: Don't believe what you read about NORD VPN
text: Don't believe what you read. This VPN cut my speed by two-thirds and dropped connections constantly. My experience is that Express VPN and Avast are both superior. Worse, to get the free 30-day trial I had to pay first with a guarantee of a refund if not satisfied. After 1 day's use, I realized this was not the product I need yet am unable to request a refund since the contact customer service links on their website are inop. Altogether a very frustrating experience.

title: Im from iran
text: Im from iran Iran internet is like china It's worst But i used Nord vpn And i had access to free internet And fast speed One of the best vpns ever i used And most friendly support ever  Thanks a lot

title: Excellence in Customer Service
text: Excellence in Customer Service.  NordVPN's real-person customer service is very responsive.  When I have an issue, I click an icon on the NordVPN app that populates the 'Contact us' dialog.  You select the topic, state what went wrong, and a few other options.  NordVPN promptly replies from a real person on the same day, even within hours, providing clear concise instructions to resolve the issue.  With NordVPN, I am very confident that my online presence is safe.

title: They listen to me and found the…
text: They listen to me and found the solution that I needed, very professional

title: My overall Experience
text: I’ve used NordVPN as a very light and occasional user.  I had. Some trouble at first with connecting and understanding how it all works because it seemed complicated but with time I understood how to use it and learned that certain devices I would have to sign out and sign back in to ensure successful connection to NordVPN.  Cross working with the Onion Browser was unreliable but doable with extra care.

title: Dumb Support Staff
text: I asked the Support Team to Close my Account and delete my Data from their servers as I want to reduce my Digital Footprint but even though I sent a detailed mail to them, the support staff cannot interpret basic English Language. He keeps on asking Silly Questions and keeps on Annoying Me.

title: Worst customer service in the world!!
text: Worst customer service in the world!!! Won't use NordVPN ever again!!

title: I am not surprised they have money to…
text: I am not surprised they have money to advertise on TV, they are a huge scam, I wrote off the large amount I payed for 3 years as there were security issues on my laptop after downloading the app. I have discovered they are taking £10.46 from my account each month as well for something. They have claimed by email that they have stopped the monthly subscription, however I cannot verify that as mysteriously I cannot get into the Nord VPN account. I have clicked on the password reset button but no link goes to my email. They claim that their email address are filtered on my email, and sent instructions on how to de-filter it. There is no way that their email could be filtered without my doing so, but as I said there were numerous security issues on my laptop after operating the VPN app. I followed their instructions and requested another password reset  link, nothing arrived.

title: The service has been fine so far but I…
text: The service has been fine so far but I was very troubled to see that their site contains an inordinate amount of trackers including: adsrvr.org disqus.com doubleclick.net facebook.com facebook.net flashtalking.com google-analytics.com and others. People use the NordVPN service for privacy, so why would they be selling out to trackers like these?

title: don't bother
text: works great at home etc, but when you really need a vpn it is useless.  It is blocked in many airports and hotels etc, and although this can be worked around using obfuscated servers, it is a hassle.  Recently however, they have implemented compulsory logins that are not only annoying when they work, but are now blocked in many countries ... if you can't login to your nordvpn account, then you can't used the vpn ... stupid!  I hate it and will not renew.

title: Good service and too many countries
text: Good service and too many countries. Connection speed also good even for online movies.

title: Beware - read the small print carefully before trying
text: Beware, their heavily advertised "30 day money back guarantee" has catches and small print. If you have used their service before then you are unable to cancel, even if you find it does not work to your satisfaction. I've found this to my cost and am now stuck as an unhappy customer for the next 2 years and they are unwilling to cancel. I've been a loyal customer for 7 years and wont be renewing with them. Very unhelpful and unreasonable on their part. Update: As confirmed by them below, if you've tried their service once before, then you can't try it again. If you pay upfront then it's hard cheese if it doesn't work, the 30 day "no quibble" money back guarantee is non existent. If I had known this I would not have given it another try. Very shady on their part. They are not the company they used to be, note the bad reviews that are starting to pile up, all saying that they aren't getting the refunds or customer service they were expecting.

title: don't bother
text: don't bother. nightmare, locked into contract with something that does not work anymore. locks me out, locks me in, can't connect, can't sign in, change password a million times, called customer services, weirdly, when we get to the bit they can't answer, i get cut off. your choice, I advise against it.

title: Bought a year plus 3 months that was…
text: Bought a year plus 3 months that was advertised my receipt read NordVPN: 1-year subscription when I downloaded the item and opened it there was no VPN included I was asked to buy another subscription to be able to use VPN. Be careful and read the small print folks. I asked for a refund and will not be using them again because of the lack of transparency

title: The NordLocker app is just really bad…
text: The NordLocker app is just really bad on iOS but everything else is good.

title: Nord never allowed me to choose my…
text: Nord never allowed me to choose my location. Switched me to Mexico no matter what. When I complained, I got a bunch of tech gobbledygook over my head. No help at my level. Could not follow what they said. Constant requests for codes and passwords I could not do. Not a tech person. Maybe ok if you are a whiz. Not me. Refused my request for refund with more excuses. Very frustrated. I want out. Does not work for me and it seems they do not really want to fix it. Non-techies, stay away

title: Non-dismissable notification spam
text: Don't buy this unless you love to be pestered with Desktop Notifications spam offers of other Nord products such as Password Manager that you can't turn off in the settings.

title: Signed up for vpn service, got something else.
text: Signed up for vpn service, instead they signed me up for Threat protect. Huh?  Not what I wanted, they refuse to respond when asking for a refund.  Tech support claims I'll have to sign up for vpn service with another subscription.  No. Will dispute charge with bank.  Advise others to not chose them for vpn service.

title: VPN connection problems
text: I quickly received help with problems that had arisen with the VPN connection to Sweden. The customer service agent was clear and guided me to a solution that resolved the issue. Regards Hans

title: Didn't work properly from the get go…
text: Didn't work properly from the get go very slow to connect and then most of Nords servers are blacklisted anyway for my needs making the service entirely pointless i get better results from using a free Vpn to be honest plus my browser set up etc hides my IP address very well again making Nord a bit pointless......the refund process works well though.

title: Great app, poor customer support
text: Great actual usage from the app, if partly drops in some regions. However the 3 star is for the ridiculous customer service. I contacted Nord to change my registration email (a fairly mundane and usual need in these things). I was required to fill in a form which it was required to enter my credit card number, expiry date and CVC number, in addition the date of purchase of my subscription and my account. Not withstanding I no longer bank with the same bank and do not have the credit card any longer I made the purchase with, this is an extremely risky and dubious way to identify someone, particularly merely for contact form, as well as a few issues regarding GDPR here in Europe. I was told bluntly support "they understand my frustration" but without those details there is nothing they can do, as they can't identify me.  My registration email is one which is about to expire is no longer usable so I will have no recourse to update it. Thus all I can think of doing is to cancel my subscription and ask for a refund for the remaining year of my subscription. This however may not also be possible as I am unable to provide my financial details.  Not the way in 2023, very pointless methodology.

title: Stay Away
text: Be careful if you cancel the recurring payment they will reactivate it and charged you expired Credit Card. Stay away from this company. VPN server are useless and detected by most companies these days also very slows

title: their service does not work with p2p…
text: their service does not work with p2p applications properly.  stay away.  refund was refused. yes i did try to contact support.  they were not helpful and because it was beyond 30 days (i purchased service for 3 years and it stopped working after 2) they said no partial refund will be made.  like i said, stay away, they are not standing by their service.

title: Terrible almost useless and very…
text: Terrible almost useless and very expensive for what you get. I can elaborate as you asked: customer support is shameful the service is barebone to say it kindly. Please don't ask me to write more.

title: Excellent customer service from Amelia at Nord
text: Amelia from the customer support team was very helpful in answering my questions about adding a dedicated IP to my existing Nord account. Thank you.

title: Issues logging in with Windows 10 app…
text: Issues logging in with Windows 10 app solved within minutes My app refused to let me log in. The support agent took the case on the chat and found the reason for the problem within a few moments. His help was polite, concise and to the point. Very happy with this!

title: I had horrible difficulty cancelling my…
text: I had horrible difficulty cancelling my subscription. I had not used NORD much because it interfered with a number of sites I needed to reach, so I had forgotten my password. They did not send a reset as they said they would so I could not get in to my account to cancel the autorenewal. do not know what I would have done except I searched for it in my notes from last year and found it after about 30 minutes. Whew! Consumers ought to demand an easier method for stopping the subsription.

title: Has been better
text: Has been better, my speedtest has halved lately with active (Nord)VPN. This was probably my last subscription renewal. Happy New Year!

title: Definitely wouldn’t recommend this vpn
text: Definitely wouldn’t recommend this vpn, the auto renew is not good either I paid for a 2 year deal then nord just took money out when it had finished to start it again spoke to the agents and got told I had won a dispute then they was putting money back in but never received it back. Then contacted them again one advisor told me I was definitely getting money back again within the 10 days didn’t receive then next advisor I spoke to said I haven’t won the dispute so wouldn’t get it back atall but I have it all in writing what the other agents said and they have just said it will carry on til next year. Really not happy about this as was over £100 absolutely terrible service wish I had of gone else where from the start. NORD VPN ARE ABSOLUTE WASTERS

title: Great Service Sorting Out My Billing Issue
text: I had a great experience with NordVPN after some billing issues - I had subscribed more than once by mistake. They dealt with this quickly and fairly. Tilda on Customer Support was very friendly. I wish all online services were like this. Thanks

title: Great help, even though it was not really his or Nords problem.
text: Philip went out of his way to help get a solid connection, at least for now. My device was been compromised and hopefully until I can get my software fixed. He was stuck helping me for a long time and never lost his patience or treated me disrespectful. Even though Samsung and bank account customer service wouldn't do anything, except tell me to go to best buy and reimbursed me for fraudulent charges on my debit card while being condensing. Thank You, Nord for finding people like Philip

title: Took about a month to “receive” the…
text: Took about a month to “receive” the items, they were delivered to the wrong house and I never received them…I have been emailing to fix this issue and they won’t answer I lost $54 to this scam…

title: Not fit for purpose
text: Not fit for purpose. Repeatedly logs itself out and refuses to be restarted, sometimes for days at a time

title: Blake is a Saint
text: Blake helped me work through a DNS problem that had plagued me for more than a month. Others gave me "cookbook" answers and solutions but Blake actually found the problem and walked me through the fix. He is top-line help.

title: Auto renew system is shady
text: I opted out of auto renew as soon as I set up my subscription. I'm now 12 months later and Nord have renewed it anyway, and are basically saying I never turned off the auto renew. Agent on chat couldn't care less. Looking online, it appears they have form for this tactic. I would encourage folk to look for another VPN provider.

title: They are lying about pricing be careful.
text: I have a transcript with NordVPN agents lying to customers about prices to obtain more subscriptions. I have a chat with several different agents and all are lying about the pricing. This is a warning for potential new customers and will be posted via several different platforms. Unbelievable! Update: There is no ticket number, there has never been a ticket number. Just a misleading/scammers company. I have all the proof I need! It is just sad that I cannot upload the transcript here.

title: Excellent service from Randolph!
text: Randolph was incredibly professional, polite and knowledgeable. Randolph quickly solved my problem giving clear instructions that were easy to understand. Amazing experience with him today, excellent service!! Thanks again Randolph for resolving my issue today! :D

title: Very constructive help
text: Very constructive help. Took their time Chat was at least 1 hour work for them. My router was not fully supported by their guide. they helped me with pictures and exactly what to do. Can recommend NordVPN to anyone. Best purchase ever concerning my privacy and speed on the web!

title: Fantasic Company no problems
text: 5 months of using NordVPN, i am more than happy with the service.It seems that the company cares about its customers & listens to any issues.The server i connect to which is very close to me had issues, this is now fixed. This company is also independent and is not part of Kape Technologies (Formerly Crossrider).Only recommendation is that Nordvpn has another protocol to work with routers other than OPENVPN.I am using Stock standard Asus GT-AX11000 with VPN fusion. Overall a fantastic service, keep up the good work.

title: WARNING WARNING WARNING!!!
text: WARNING WARNING WARNING!!! They totally scammed me. I paid for it to use it. It didn’t work, and I reached out to their customer service multiple times. No one could fix whatever the problem was, and therefor I wanted to cancel my subscription. But they didn’t, and charged me for THREE months of ZERO usage instead. I tried to talk to them, but zero response. I have never ever experienced worse support and I’m SO disappointed in how they've handled my inquiry. Finally I tried to delete my account, and they would not help me, or let me do so. This is a scam-  DO NOT SIGN UP WITH NORD VPN EVER!!! There are SO many other streaming sites available, and so far everyone else have been great with the support, cancelling requests and just general support and honesty.

title: The service does not work in Iran.
text: I ordered a one-month package for my sister in Iran. The service doesn't work in Iran. After that, NordVPN is charging my credit card without my permission, even though I told them that the account is for my sister and she doesn't have access to the NordVPN website. Eventually, I contacted my bank to renew my credit card.

title: I was near to cancel my subscription…
text: I was near to cancel my subscription because torrent was not working good on bandwith. But thanks to Aurora (on tchat) and very quick technic advise. I had the solution fix in 5min. The tchat is working very good even after restarting PC, I got back same contact.

title: The service did not work for me at all
text: The service did not work for me at all. I got a one month subscription and it worked 'okay' for the first 3 days and then not at all. I contacted customer support which was totally unhelpful. I tried troubleshooting the issue on my own with the internet as help and it alleviated no issues. I would not recommend this service for anyone in the UK trying to watch shows in the United States. Such a let down and sad to see it endorsed by so many.

title: i didnt like the sevice, its just name thats it
text: they can't fix the server and they can't refund the money as well isn't it funny...I have tried everything to connect in the high restriction area but it is not happening at all and then I tried to contact with the support it seems they don't have any way solve it so I tried to get a refund but since a few days more than a month so they can't refund and my sub-plan of one year is gone weast, this is something you need to be flexible with your client I am not happy with that, I really didn't like it

title: Don't buy their yearly subscriptions.
text: The IP addresses of all of their servers started being detected by the TV providers I was using to watch TV from my home country, basically rendering their service unusable. Perhaps I should have purchased a monthly subscription. At least then I could have cancelled it as soon as the service pretty much stopped working. Do NOT buy their yearly subscriptions, as if the same thing happens to you, you will not be able to get your money back past the 30 day window.

title: Best security and fast vpn service…
text: Best security and fast vpn service ever. Price its little high compared to other companies. More countries and servers should be added. Only 6 device is allowed to connect at a time which is very bad. Todays we live around technology with lots of electronic devices, each and every device should be secure.

title: Loads slower than old Photoshop app on NT
text: Loads slower than an old Photoshop app on NT! Why? They also changed the control interface a while back and managed to make it more ambiguous/confusing. Don't believe hype and expect to view all shows out of your official service area; at best the odds are 50/50 or worse that you will succeed. OTOH, I suspect this is true for all VPNs (some streamers are quite diligent and make lists of ISPs). Other than that, it seems to work OK. Like any app you buy, be sure you are crystal clear on HOW you are paying, HOW to cancel, and what kind of refund you can expect (or not).

title: Auto renew policy is hidden
text: The auto renew policy is hidden and no communication has been received when the company have charged my payment method. It would be polite to simply send an email to confirm. They are trying to catch you out. The ability to cancel the subscription is then intentionally made difficult.

title: Quick response, the right answers, problem solved!
text: I needed some guidance to extend my NordVPN subscription while taking advantage of an online promo, and Nina from Customer Service (via the Chat window) was immediately available, understood my problem, provided quick and cheery responses, and most importantly, all of her guidance worked perfectly on the first try.  All customer service should be like this.  Thanks Nina!

title: Inconsistent security rules from a security company
text: My phone was broken and I can't access my authentor anymore, hence need an alternative way to access my account. I had the worst customer service experience, super unprofessional.  They do accept any screenshot from Paypal, Alipay etc and think this is safe enough, then tell me they don't accept mine since the same method is not safe. How can you trust a security company that has inconsistent safety rules! I still have more than a year paid in my account and can't even get a refund

title: Top drawer service and protection
text: It is very refreshing to see professionalism is still a part of consumer interactions. My (self-inflicted) software problem was addressed quickly and effectively. Thanks, NordVPN - I realized how vulnerable my computer was the short period of time without your service. (Not to mention the plethora of ads that were eliminated after a software reboot!)

title: I was on with Philip from the Nord VPN…
text: I was on with Philip from the Nord VPN Linux team, massive help to resolve a problem I was having with a Linux computer and even another issue related to it. Amazing person, hope he gets good recognition!! ;)

title: The fact that NordVPN has the ability…
text: The fact that NordVPN has the ability to chat online is great and makes you never wait too long to solve your problem.  I also have a special thanks to  Randolph because he was very kind and patient to solve my problem .

title: Kudos to Phiiip on NordVPN Connectivity Team
text: I want to give special recognition to Philip on the NordVPN Technical team. While everyone I've dealt with on Nord's customer service team is excellent, Philip is superior. His expertise and profesionalism are exceptional and worthy of special recognition. I was extremely frustrated in trying to install our Nord VPN in a new router. The router company was not at all helpful but Philip helped solve the problem and it wasn't easy. It took a number of attempts to resolve the issue - not once but two times - and each time he handled the situation with great patience and skill. So kudos to Philip and I hope he gets the recognition he deserves!

title: Hailey is an excellent customer service rep!
text: I’ve just written one of these but don’t think it saved. Hailey was really helpful helping me understand some technicalities of my subscription. Hailey was Patient, professional and gave simple answers. Friendly profession and they also signposted me Black Friday deals for my extension. I’ve been a happy customer for several years. Nord are good and I also use with my family.

title: Support via chat is very good
text: Support via chat is very good. The help from Damon, who wrote all the steps i could do to fix the problem, was perfect. Eventually, it came down on the latest version that was not working on my laptop. So he pointed me to an earlier version which did work. Now ill wait for the next release to be out. After that i hope all is fixed. Otherwise, i will be consulting the excellent support from NordVPN again. Kudos to Damon !

title: I had a great experience
text: I had a great experience! At first I couldn't watch the streaming service I wanted, but with the assistance of NordVPN team, I could. They were very helpful and attentive. They talked me through all the steps to fix my problem. Plus, their chat system is great. I had a connecction break, but when I reconnected it all just came right back. I didn't lose everything like it happens with other chats. A special thanks to Jaylee.

title: Prompt response from Twitter team
text: I’ve been a NordVPN subscriber for the last couple of years and I’ve had great experience since. So I’ve just encountered an issue connecting to servers and tried emailing them from the app (to which I didn’t get a reply) but their Twitter response team promptly replied and did excellent job in suggesting what to do. Issue was resolved quickly! Couldn’t be happier to recommend NordVPN to anyone searching for a trustworthy and reliable VPN provider.

title: The support was wonderful
text: The support was wonderful. "Sierra" was very patient due to my hard problem, not being able to download the NVPN - APP . Some governments give their best to block VPN´s. But the support gave me a special link which after some time worked perfectly well out and after a few attempts I could log in and everything just worked out.

title: Great customer service experience
text: I received quick response when I contacted the customer service through the online chat, and Brandy the customer service agent was very helpful in answering all my questions, providing useful links, and event went a step further to offer me great deals. I have always preferred calling instead of chatting, but this experience has changed my impression. Great job!

title: Connection Issue
text: I could not connect to internet while using the VPN. Jackson (whom will be forever known as Super Jackson) patiently walked me through several different possibilities and eventually hit the right one - thereby saving the day (and, who knows, maybe even the whole world). Well done, Jackson! (don't accept any job offers from twitter.  js)

title: Not safe
text: Don't use this VPN if you care about your information safety. Multiple times when I start my PC, the software logs me out and I need to "turn off kill switch" to log in again. Then automatically opens my browser, reopens all the previous tabs and exposes them to my real IP and giving information to the ISP. What a joke. Every time I contact customer support about an issue, they ask for a bunch of my personal information that you should not send over e-mail. Lastly every single one of their IPs are grey-listed by major websites and makes using the VPN a hassle or straight up impossible.

title: Been a customer since this time last…

title: Dreadful customer service experience…
text: Dreadful customer service experience and a friction full method to confirming account holder identification.  Their app begged me to turn on 2 factor authentication every time I logged in. I got sick of seeing it so I applied it using Google Authenticator. When I swapped phones I didn’t know I needed to transfer authentication codes. So I lost my login method.  I asked for NordVPN customer services to turn off my 2FA so I can gain access again to my account that has a 2 year paid subscription on it. And in order to do this they want me to provide the full 16 digit card number I paid on. Which I no longer have as it’s a credit card account I closed last year. So in order to get this information I would have to go and ask my previous credit provider for it. NOT TO MENTION ASKING CUSTOMERS TO SEND FINANCIAL DETAILS LIKE LONG CARD NUMBERS OVER EMAIL IS EXTREMELY DANGEROUS AND SHOWS THAT CUSTOMER PRIVACY MEANS LITTLE TO NORD.  THE FACT THAT YOU HAVE MY PAYMENT CARD DETAILS ON FILE TO VERIFY MY IDENTITY WITH, SUGGESTS YOU MAYBE OPERATING IN VIOLATION OF UK AND EU PAYMENT LAWS. THAT PAYMENT SHOULD HAVE BEEN SENT TO NORD AS AN ENCRYPTED TRANSACTION. So instead I say you know what, fine delete my account instead then please Nord. Oh and the answer is the same. It’s not my fault you don’t ask customers to setup security questions when signing up. I’ve provided you already with a receipt and the last 4 digits of the card and I’m emailing you from the account holder email address. There’s not much more I can do. It’s your product manager who failed to put in better verification mechanisms not the customers. Once I’m done fighting you via the UK Information Commissioner Office to delete my data. I will take my business elsewhere. You have a good product but terrible, terrible support.

title: Room for Improvement
text: Update 2022/12/15: Nordvpn refunded me the last recurring payment as promised. I changed the review to 3 stars. The team on social media is a lot better than the ones on the live chat.  Review on 2022/12/11: I had never used NordVPN before, and I thought I gave it try because ExpressVPN no longer supports Mac systems anymore. I purchased the 30-day money-back guarantee monthly package, but I did not know that this VPN does not work in China despite trying different connections. I could not contact them in China because all VPN websites are banned there. So I contacted NordVPN customer service after I came back. I thought a big company like NordVPN would treasure their customer experience and will compensate their customers when issues arise. To my surprise, NordVPN DID NOT CARE AT ALL. All this company cares about is its own profit.  Customer service agents are trained not to give a refund regardless of whether there are issues with them or not. They will keep repeating the same message and refuse to refund. Also, no ticket number, no transcript sent to email. And what's more, I found that my earlier conversation started to disappear, and I could not record the whole conversation.  I don't see any attitude of them trying to fix any problems, improve, or care about their customers. What I see is they are cheating customers, not offering what they promise but charging them anyways.  Please BE AWARE of this company. This is almost a true scam for a company this size. I just want to say a company that does not treasure its customer experience should not be treasured by its customers.

title: For Canadians, be aware that prices shown are only in US dollars even though this is not disclosed anywhere
text: If you are in Canada, be aware that any pricing you are shown on the NordVPN site is actually in US dollars, and not in Canadian dollars. Nowhere on the NordVPN do they actually tell you that they price only in US dollars (despite not being a US-based company) and that they are unable to show prices in Canadian dollars. Apparently, NordVPN only has the limited ability to show prices in US dollars, Euros, UK pounds, Brazilian reals, Japanese yen, Indian rupees, Swiss francs, Polish zloty, or South Korean won. Even though Canada has a population greater than either Switzerland or Poland, NordVPN cannot figure out how to include Canadian dollars as a currency option for displaying prices. I had looked at a 2-year standard plan on the NordVPN site, and it stated that the price was "$80.73". The next line item on the pricing said "Tax country: Canada" and "GST/HST 13%" with a value of "$10.49". The total amount was shown "$91.22". Given that they identified that I reside in Canada and incorporated the appropriate Canadian sales tax, this gives the impression that all $ prices shown on the site are in Canadian dollars. On the left hand side of the page, for credit card payment it indicated that "Payments are charged in CAD", which appears to confirm that the amount of $91.22 is a Canadian dollar amount that will be charged to my credit card in CAD. There were no disclaimers, no footnotes and no terms & conditions that indicated that the $91.22 was actually in US dollars, not in Canadian dollars. When I completed the purchase, my credit card was actually charged $123.97! When I contacted NordVPN support about this discrepancy in the amount I was shown and the amount I was charged, they told me that I should know that "$91.22" is US dollars, because they believe that "$" symbol only references US dollars (even though they do not disclose this assumption anywhere on their website). The customer service representative from NordVPN then told me that in Canada, prices do not use the "$" symbol, that instead "CA$" is what is used for Canadian dollars in Canada. Obviously NordVPN has no idea that in Canada we list prices using "$" to reference our Canadian dollars, and we do NOT use "CA$". If you shop in stores in Canada or on any Canadian website, the "$" symbol is used to denote Canadian dollars. I have since asked for a full refund from NordVPN, because their practice of showing "$" prices to Canadians without disclosing that the amount is actually in US dollars is misleading, dishonest, and possibly an intentional bait & switch by NordVPN to overcharge Canadians, hoping that we do not notice that a higher amount gets charged after the payment is processed. All Canadians need to be warned that any pricing you see on NordVPN is only in US dollars. NordVPN fails to disclose this, so be forewarned!

Finally I was connected to someone called Llyod who after spending an hour kept insisting that he is able to resolve it, and reminding that he can't help (which is frustrating as well). title: No refund available when requested within 30 day…
text: No refund when requested within 30 day trial period. I called on chat with Sage for to have a refund during the 30 day trial period. If the billing system shut down for a millisecond I guarantee it would be fixed in a millisecond. Very disappointed with the response and service delivered by NordVPN. Update 16/11/22: After I posted my statement here on Trustpilot the technical issue preventing the repayment process was instantly fixed. I remain very cynical about NordVPNs commitment to a smooth refund within the 30 day window. There is no tab to click and you have to go through chat line and endure the excuses I had to listen to to beg for a refund. Beware about signing up for the 30 day trials. I will now keep my fingers crossed the refund is processed quickly into my bank account. Update 18/11/22: Refund received.

Service was quick and helpful and friendly and we decided to keep our service with NordVPN because of the deal and service  Nathaniel was able to provide for us. Thanks!

title: Nonsense Malware protection

Had to re-install windows to ensure was 100% safe. Thanks nord support for your reply, but it’s no use now. Nothing available, pc was wiped.

Well Jordan walked me through trying to MacGyver a work-around to get perfect streaming of the game! This seriously took like 4 hours but it was like diffusing a bomb over the phone. Such a patient and knowledgeable techie! So glad to have such a fun time troubleshooting. Highly recommend this team, and especially for having chat support 24/7 (i think?) Which is super accessible. A+++

title: May be ok if you are in the US, definitely not for ex-pats.
text: So. Bad. Nord takes 15+ minutes to initially load, 40% of the time. It always wants to connect to Mexico - I bought the service so I can appear to be in the US! It will not allow me to choose "United States" as a permanent log-on option (IT IS THE ONLY OPTION I WANT) but always chooses a Mexican IP and even after being manually corrected over and over and over, consistently drops the US server to reconnect to Mexico. If you keep clicking the US option it often stalls for 10+ minutes! Then Nord tells me, I'm offline. Yeah. That's why I'm shopping on one website & listening to YouTube on another. I have excellent, high quality internet that only drops infrequently. I paid for Nord, it sucks, I hate it and I'm stuck with it for a long long time.  2 stars because if I fight with it, don't give up, keep clicking that button and work at it, I can get on US-only websites for entertainment, and Walmart & Amazon - for a while.  Truly, this is so frustrating that sometimes I feel like I'll have a stroke in anger. I do hope I'm a little bit telekinetic & cause someone at Nord to drop dead instead. Someone who made the decision to not only market to resident Americans, but to ex-pats living abroad. It's shameless greed to sell a product that DOESN'T WORK.

title: Very poor support
text: I took out a subscription to their NordLocker service. As I didn't use it enough I decided to cancel and I did this 2 weeks before my subscription expired. Despite this, NordVPN took another year's payment from my bank and pointed to some small print that said they would take next year's payment 2 weeks in advance. I pointed out that I was trying to cancel but they were adamant they would NOT refund my payment even though the next year's worth of service hadn't started and I didn't plan to use it. On reading different pages on their website I found conflicting and misleading information, but every time I pointed this out, the customer service agent just went back to their conditions of service and repeated that they were entitled to take premiums 2 weeks early.  I was interested in trying NordVPN but because I was treated so badly over the NordLocker issue, I decided it wasn't worth it. They got their one year premium for NordLocker and lost a potentially much more lucrative subscription to NordVPN as a result.

He got me a list of UK servers and then asked if I needed any from another country. No one's ever asked. Hopefully, with the second list, I won't lose them all in one night again! Thanks Norman. He nailed it and was also friendly, helpful. Hang on to Norman, Nord! He's a keeper.

title: Great speed, reliability, and efficient customer service
text: The IOS and Windows applications are very easy to use, and the server reliability is much better than other services I've used such as SurfShark and PIA - no more lag when streaming. However, after a couple days the Windows app stopped working, so I chatted with support and was very impressed with how efficient the process is and how kind their service rep Jarvis was. I ran the diagnostics tool using the Windows app, which generated a ticket number which I gave to the service rep (Jarvis), and they were able to figure out what was wrong and got my vpn working again in 5 minutes.

title: Good service, but static IP setup is sub optimal
text: Nord auto-billed me for a dedicated IP in September but then failed to renew the IP. This ended up locking me out of critical systems that depended on this IP. I contacted Nord support when the IP stopped working (not realising I had already paid) and they told me to open a new Nord account under a separate email. Only later when doing my bookkeeping did I notice the payment for this service leaving my account in September, but at this point I had moved to another provider. I contacted Nord for a refund and they refused me based on the fact that 30 days had lapsed. This is despite me contacting them and getting incorrect advice (to pay again) back in October. Nord offered me another 9 months for free (why if not an admission of wrong doing?), I declined and they refuse to return my money. I've used Nord for years and have 10 members of staff that I've encouraged to use Nord in the past. They've totally lost my trust. EDIT 10th Nov 2022 - Support put this right in the end. I think however the way customers are required to setup a separate account for a static IP needs work and is prone to the miscommunications I have experienced.

REPLY TO NORD'S REPLY BELOW: Pity you didn't issue my REFUND as quick as you replied to my negative feedback. title: NordVPN does it all, even for newbie to a VPN. Best in Class by far
text: Thank you, Jordan. I was interested in getting a VPN but my knowledge about how a VPN works and to setup and use a VPN was very limited. Also, there was many VPNs and which were best ones and value for money. To be honest I was a little lost. I went on to NordVPN website and looked at the options to find out more about a VPN and if it was right for me. The website was easy to browse and get many answers but I was still unsure. I saw that they had a web support that I could chat to an agent, a real person so I connected and I found myself talking to Jordan. He was a real gentleman; He was patient and answer all my questions. explaining how a VPN works and that it could do all that I hoped that a VPN do for my needs. no question was to simple or complicated and took all the time I needed. He also gave me a link to video tutorials in how to use a VPN, which was great. He also gave me a great package that was much less than I was expecting. I paid for my package and I now have the VPN up and working. I am very happy and I really appreciated Jordans assistance.  NordVPN is the real deal. I cannot recommend it enough. If you are looking for a high-end VPN look no further than NordVPN Frank

title: Excellent customer service
text: I use NordVPN daily and have been a customer for about 3-4 years now. The amount of features that come with a paid subscription are well worth it. Need to connect more devices? Just get a compatible router and follow instructions to setup Nord on that router, then connect as many devices as you want to the router and it will only count as one device. Any phone, laptop, or device you connect with will automatically be protected with a VPN.  I've debated between this and ProtonVPN and still go with Nord. A lot more servers to pick from and faster speeds from what I've experienced.

title: Check Auto Renew
text: I signed up for NordVPN for one month with the intention of using it abroad.  A few months later I noticed that I was still paying although I thought I'd purchased just a single 1 month service.  I didn't realise that this it would auto renew. I accept that's my responsibility but it certainly wasn't clear at the time of purchase.  I asked for a refund for the 3 months when I hadn't used the service and I was met with the classic corporate response "we'd love to refund you but we're not allowed".

title: Phillip was very helpful in helping me…
text: Phillip was very helpful in helping me track down my issue with NordVPN. It was stuck on a single VPN server and couldn't disconnect or switch to a different VPN server. The issue seems to have been related to migrating from an Intel MacBook to an M1 MacBook.  He suggested I remove the NordVPN interface in System Preferences > Network and that worked to kill the connection and reset the NordVPN app. After restarting the app and logging in to it, it created a new interface and I was able to connect and disconnect normally.

title: Auto Renewal Issue
text: I had been charged via auto-renewal 2 weeks earlier than my subscription end date. I spoke to an Lennie via chat. They informed me they send out an email 30 days before charging (my stupidity for missing it), I had planend to move onto the 2 year plan as it was better value for money. Lennie gave me 2 choices I was able to cancel and then subscribe to the 2 year plan, or as they value repeating customers offered me an additional 18months of NordVPN with the money that had already been charged, which was a better deal.

I recommend it to anyone who will actually be using it regularly.

title: Congratulations for Nord VPN customer…

title: Not recommended for servers in Argentina
text: I should start saying that NordVPN does not deliver what they promise.  First of all, if NordVPN read all my support chats since I contracted the service they will see I’ve been having the same recurrent issue which none of their customer service agents were able to solve - and this even includes a manager. My frustration over the past few days has been building up. I went through troubleshooting over and over again - I can even confirm that the first step is to run a DNS leak test which I have completed several times in a successful manner.  The key issue here does not seem to be configuration related and hence why agents cannot seem to help out. I have been advised that the servers in the country I wanted to connect to (Argentina) get “overloaded”, preventing users to use them correctly and causing ridiculously slow speeds. I ran several speed test which all came back at a download speed of 1mbps whilst without a VPN on my regular speed is 70mbps I have also been given some other arguments such as servers in country I wanted to connect to were too far away from my actual location (London) and hence why low speeds. When the issue is not speed, it’s related to Netflix detecting I am using a proxy and therefore not letting me stream any content. Reality is I do not care whatever the reason is. I contracted NordVPN because I wanted to access content from Argentina and and all I know is that the service/product is not fit for purpose. If I need to take a step further, customer service provided by the company is just poor. It is surprisingly quick to reach/speak to the support team. However, I think good customer service is about quality and not quantity/access speed to it.  The responses/troubleshooting I was given can be found on the website and they only follow these 101 steps. However, if things do get more technical then they need to create a ticket and raise it with the actual “engineers”, which obviously takes time to hear back. Also, I was provided troubleshooting steps as setting manual DNS address on my network configuration in windows whilst I had repetitively explained to the agent that I was using OPENVPN config on my ASUS router as I wanted all my devices to be connected to a VPN. Therefore, this simply shows signs that agents do not read carefully to customer needs. In addition to this, there’s no contact phone number. Support is only provided via chat which makes things also a bit impersonal and frustrating as sometimes a phone call can be much quicker than having an endless chat - I believe we all experience this, even at work when colleagues use teams rather than grabbing the phone and discuss something in literally 5 minutes. For all these reasons I just mentioned, I do believe NordVPN is far away from a good business. In fact, I do not think the business has a long term reason to exist, which is actually concerning for stakeholders of this business. Market is quite competitive and NordVPN definitely does not achieve good standards in terms of reliability which is key for companies of this type.

title: Awful experience with the renewal and…
text: Awful experience with the renewal and cancellation of recurring subscriptions. They sent me an email that if I want to avoid any account and service suspension and delay, I need to activate the renewal option. That was a meaning for me that renewal and auto payment will not happen in my account. As I have not used the service for more than one year, I did not want to renew, so I supposed that it is ok and there will be NO auto payment as they sent me that email. Surprisingly, two months after that email, they withdraw the sum of the recurring subscription from my credit card and they never refund me, just asked me if I want to cancel autorenewal for the next year or no. If you are looking for a service that they care about its customer's needs and satisfaction, based on my experience they are not good.

title: Change email on NORD VPN
text: So I retire close my business. I try to change my email on NORDVPN. They want all the usual security checks how much I paid who with. I provide all this then they ask for the apple pay transaction number which was so long ago even apple don't hold it. So I use my old email until the account runs out a year later, Cancel auto renew sign up with my new email. Suddenly I have two accounts. I spend an hour talking to Lloyd online by which time I've figured out what's going on I think but he's not got a clue and doesn't do what he said he would. I go through the same conversation with Nick who I think does what he says he would but asked for a review of online help I reply to the email and am helped directly by them. I'm refunded for my new email account and the free month on my old account runs out. That was the problem Lloyd that's why I had two accounts. So I sign my partner up with her email and bingo my old email keeps on showing up. It may not be Nord's fault but. All I wanted to do was change my email and just keep on auto renewing my account. What a hassle three hours wasted.

title: Auto-Renewal
text: I took the service out under the heading ONE YEAR SUBSCRIPTION... that's what it states on the confirmation email. I paid through Paypal because I thought it was secure and didn't think that anyone could touch my money. There was no mention of any auto renewal. I would at least expect a warning that money was going to be coming out of my account beforehand!!  But...they have taken £94.00 out of my account (which I can't afford) on the basis of this hidden auto renewal button that is hidden in your settings, and it is your responsibility to change.... It's hidden for a reason by the way! The renewal cost is almost double of which I originally paid.  I HAVE BEEN TOTALLY SCAMMED!!! UPDATE: 31.10.22  I have now received a full PayPal refund and I am satisfied this complaint has been resolved. Thanks!

title: NordVPN is the worst
text: Occured before and around 02/24/22. About a month after the 30 day refund window NordVPN started to consistently drop a secure connection (exposing me while I'm away at work) and eventually couldn't connect at all. I contacted support still interested in making it work and did everything they suggested. It still didn't work. I deleted Nord entirely off my computer and re-downloaded it at least 9 times. I restarted my computer, checked that it was functioning properly, upgraded drivers, ran all sorts of scans. Nothing worked, so I contacted them again and explained nothing you have suggested has worked and I'm sick of this so I'd like a refund, please. The customer service creeps I had to deal with were totally unapologetic and insisted they would never give me a refund because I was past the 30 day window and that I just needed to do MORE FREE WORK TO FIX THEIR SERVICE! I pointed out the problems only occurred conveniently about one month after that window closed and I was not interested in doing free work to fix their garbage. Terrible, and I'm not the only one. There are multiple posts on review websites about similar garbage service and push back from Nord. Some lucky people only got a refund after they complained on Twitter. I hate Twitter and will never use it so this wasn't an option for me. Nord is a terrible VPN. Even years prior, while it usually worked consistently it would for no reason at all drop a connection and fail to auto connect afterwards. The worst part about all this is the ultra cringe-y way they will do everything they can to avoid refunding a measly $60 bucks and fail to acknowledge them ripping you off. I paid for a service that stopped working and that's my problem. I paid for nothing. I understand charge-backs look bad for a company but if you keep the money after your service fails your just scamming people. Stay away from NordVPN. Terrible company, terrible service. To Nord, sorry it took me so long to post these reviews. I got so angry I couldn't think straight and decided to cool off only to forget the need to inform others. Also, they and the people they sponsor on Youtube for example are blatantly lying about using Nord for watching Netflix and Hulu. Both services rapidly stop working if you use a VPN. You can connect at first and watch stuff from other countries for about 30 minutes then they stop playing and bring up an error message that your using a VPN! WE NEED TO KNOW WHERE YOU ARE! I don't blame Nord for this but they need to stop blatantly lying about it being one of the perks of a VPN. It never worked for more than one episode. I always had to disconnect from Nord to watch things on either. In conclusion: I paid for a service to set it and forget it. Not work out bugs for free. Some of the worst business practice and customer service I've ever encountered. I feel totally ripped off. Terrible waste of time.

title: One of the best things about Nord is…
text: One of the best things about Nord is how dedicated and patient and thorough its help team is. As having a VPN becomes more and more a must, so too does having the reassurance you can get help, especially if you're not paticularly tech savvy, in ensuring it runs compatibly with your online needs. There has never been a time where I've found the experience of contacting Nord's help team to be anything other than diligent, courteous, and dedicated to problem-solving to the best of their abilities. I should make a special note of the assistance supplied by a really excellent member of the connectibility team, Jackson, who not only answered questions about a particularly complicated and delicate issue that has arisen for me, telling me what I needed to know honestly and concisely, but who also went above and beyond to walk through the nature of the issue and to creatively troubleshoot it with me, in spite of it taking some time to do so. There are an intimidating number of VPN options out there these days, with many of them unreliable, and, with its focus on providing not a VPN not just as a product but as a comprehensive userability experience, Nord's status as an industry leader remains well deserved.

text: I used MFA/2FA and I lost my phone. I got a new one and I got problems with the MFA. I contacted NordVPN support by chat and asked if they could turn MFA off, but I had to identify myself answering questions when and how I signed for an account. I didnt keep my first email from NordVPN and I also lost my credit cards with the phone, so I was not able to answer any of the questions.. But, then my excellent chat agent Aoife suggested I could send a screenshot of my bank statement, and then it took only 5 seconds and I was again able to log on my account. Thanks to great understanding from Aoife.

title: 3.5/5 for service but 1/5 for billing practices.
text: I used NordVPN for three years and was increasingly dissatisfied with the connection speed and it's failure to automatically reconnect. For that I would have rated the service as a 3.5/5. However, I opted to let my service expire and purchased VPN services from a competitor (SurfShark) this past March. I discovered 6 months later that NordVPN had charged my credit card for another year anyway. Unfortunately it was a card I no longer use and do not receive print statements for so this went unnoticed for 6 months and resulted in interest charges etc.. When I requested a refund from Nord, they refused. I pointed out that I had not authorized the charge and had not used their services since my previous service period lapsed, they refused to refund me anyway. I would give then a 1/5 for that but in balance my overall rating is a 2/5.

He was trying to solve my problem but simply did not know about the change.  NO LONGER HAPPY with NordVPN  and disappointed in the support. text: I was having buffering problems with one of my streaming services. Be sure to learn ASK if you have an internet problem.  I got server number recommendations and learned how to use "search" to get better service from my streaming service.  So I could have just contacted NORD and not lived with this buffering problem for over 2 months.  Mathiew stayed with me to the very end.  Thanks also to Lawrence and Timothy who got me to the right person. My experience is that most companies disconnect you if you're too much trouble.  It took time to help me with my limited knowledge and NORD provided me with the help I needed.

title: Their vpn is 100% garbage
text: Their vpn is 100% garbage. Their web app version doesn't work-won't let you even log in. The chromebook extension works for to block "some sites" BUT it no longer works to block Youtubetv so that a paying customer can watch it outside of the US. I recently started a subscription w/youtubetv and, again, it doesn't work-EVEN though they advertise falsely that their vpn works best w/Youtubetv. Their customer service is beyond atrocious and actually hostile-and they expect you to do the troubleshooting for them! I had purchased a 2 year plan ($94) a year before I got the Youtubetv paid monthy subscription and they REFUSED to refund a measle $47 back to me. They are based in Panama City in order to skirt US laws and regulation, naturally. They are petty and cheap. I had to switch to their big rival, ExpressVPN and it works w/Youtubetv.  UPDATE: So their almost IMMEDIATE response to my posted review proves my point. They are worried about what their customers are posting out there online about them these days. It's clear they have an automated way to see new reviews on this site every day. Hilarious. So now they want the ticket #? For what? They have provided zero customer service/support and have refused to refund my 2nd year of my subscription. So now they will refund me? I highly doubt that-it would just be another waste of my time-I asked to support to escalate my ticket to management for refund and all they was continually make excuses and refuse to do so. Completely disingenuous.

title: Impressive customer service!
text: I'm extremely impressed with the live chat customer service! I use Pop_OS as my daily driver. I ran a system update while connected to NordVPN without checking what was being updated. Turns out, one of the updates was for NordVPN. I was, of course, disconnected. When the update finished, I attempted to reconnect. Failure. After messing around with it for a while, I decided to reach out to their customer support via the live chat option on the site. I didn't have high expectations on getting a tech that knows Linux, but man, "Bonnie", as the chat box claimed, really know her stuff! She had me up and running again in a matter of a few minutes. Thank you for having excellent customer support. I believe it to be one of the very most important factors in a company's success. Well done, NordVPN.

title: Fast and Prompt Service

title: Local Devices not reachable
text: Had the problem that local devices couldn't be reached as soon as NordVPV established a connection and wondered if there was a way to get arround this. I initiated a chat with the support and was recommended to use protocol IKEv2 in this case and this worked fine. Friendly, competent, flawless support! Thanks!

title: Internet Issue when Nordvpm was paused
text: Had issues connecting to the internet when Nordvpm was paused. Customer Chat support was great. Damon was courteous and quickly resolved the problem with the diagnostic log. It turns out the Kill Switch was toggled to "on - when vpm is down". All good now.

title: NordVPN support
text: I recently had a billing issue with NordVPN. In July I  had purchased a software bundle that included a year of NordVPN. I added the year to my currently active account which was due to end in November of 2022. The additional year would bring me through November of 2023. This change was not reflected on my account when using the NordVPN web site. It did show the change when I looked at the apps on my phone and tablet. I contacted Nord support via email. After a few back and forths with them they insisted that my account was good thru November 2023 even tho it was not reflected on their site. I took them at their word. On Oct.13 I received an email saying I would be charged in 30 days to extend my experiencing account. I got on the chat today and agent Lloyd was able to correct the issue quickly and without any problems. He was able to correct the expiration date on my account when previous support reps were unable to. I appreciate how quickly he was able to fix the problem. Thank you Lloyd!

title: How to find your registered email for NordVPN
text: I have a yearly subscription to Nordvpn and today I found out my account is inactive. The actual cause of this is because I mistook my registered account on NordVPN. Since I thought I made the right account to log in, I guessed it probably was a back end problem about the app. So I talked with a chat bot on nordvpn help site that lead me to a live agent. Then the nice agent Vincent just asked for a sort of transaction ID.(example: GPA.xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxx..0) When I provided Vincent with that info, he just told me the exact account that I registered. I could log in to my NordVPN later on and I'm really appreciated for the helpful info Vincent provided.

They very quickly helped me with my issue, thanked me for being a recurring customer and lengthened my subscription time for free. It is always comforting when you feel that a big company actually has your best interests at heart. If you want to be a valued customer who receives great  and reliable service, I recommend NordVPN. title: uskng nordvpn for just over 2 yrs
text: I've been using nordvpn for just over 2 years now. I've never had an issue with connecting or slow speeds etc. Even the Firefox browser extension is pretty decent.  I just came across my first issue now. It said I was using the max 6 devices and need to disconnect one to connect.... I found out some weird email "callcenteragent423@gmail" was connected to my account for God knows how long. So I disconnected it and finally enabled 2fa.  Contacted live support to ask about the service credital username and password since I couldn't see where tovchange it... Figure the email attached to my account was some kind of bot net and likely using it on a router anyways. I spoke with "Jordan" and they were great. Usually, livechat agents (no matter how rich the comany) will know nothing about the site/service and just copy paste from a transcript and be of no help. But Jordan said he wasn't to sure, so he would look into it. Only took him about 45 seconds and he told me it will automatically change once I create a new account password....   Which he had already told me to do from the start (:  Normally I'd rate 4/5 max but what gets the extra 25% here is how human Jordan spoke. Didn't paste anything from a script, seems like hes fluent in English  which is a MAJOR plus for support agents. It's so frusturing having to use live support anyone online usually. But not my experience with NordVPN!

title: NordVpn - The Worst Customer Support Possible
text: Firstly their connections were terrible when I first joined back in 2019 and although better now, still nowhere near ExpressVpn that I was using before them. What is absolutely appaling is their customer service. They renewed my contract this year and then I was unable to login with certain computers as they keep making you change your password whether you want to or not. I tried to use their website to reset my password but their Forgot Your Password wasn't sending me a reset email as THEY were having a problem with my registered email's domain although I was getting emails from them at that address. I then went through days that went into weeks trying to get this sorted but they said the ONLY way of doing this was to let them know what the payment date and method were. I couldn't find this and they wouldn't give me even the date of payment as they are a security firm that are apparently more secure than CIA in handing over critical info such as what date was the payment made. I asked all 4 of the customer "support" people what name they debited it in and all 4 insisted it was NordVpn.com. FINALLY after my bookeeper looked through 3 bank accounts, 7 credit cards, Paypal and direct bank payments we found it under MOONFLASH LTD with no mention of NORDVPN!! Total incompetence or what!  I have now sent them this information and 3 further emails and they are ghosting me as they must be too embaressed to admit how incompetent they are! UPDATED- 13 OCT 22 After receiving their reply below saying they are still looking into this I tried logging in then the Forgot Password link,  I did get  the password reset email and so reset my password. I then could get into my account last night but guess what, today I'm locked out AGAIN for "Security Reasons"?? Can they be any more useless going further! My guess is yes but let's see!

text: I tried a lot of vpns including express vpn but none works probably where i live because most of them is restricted in my country but nord worked for me and it’s very fast and there is a lot of locations options and there is a lot of different specialty servers like (double vpn, obfuscated vpn , dedicated vpn and more) and today i had a problem connecting my tv to a vpn because the feature that i should turn on is called smartdns and it doesn’t work when u have ur vpn turned on and most of the popular vpn websites here is also restricted so I talked with support asked to talk with agent responded immediately his/her name is carl and i told him/her the problem he knew exactly what i was talking about so he gave me another nord vpn website domain that will work in my country so i can turn on smart dns abd now i have a vpn on my tv I really recommend Nord vpn

title: Although I do not have an account
text: Although I do not have an account, I was thinking of getting an account until I realised they seem to be ripping people off.  I was looking at a 2 year plan with 4 months free at a cost of £4.04/mo. Now multiply 24 months (2 years) by £4.04 it gives you a total of £96.96 not £113.13 like there price guide shows, BUT if you multiply 28 (the 2 years plus the 4 free months) by the £4.04 it gives you a total of £113.12. They tried to tell me that there was VAT so went to the next page where there was VAT added at £22.63 giving a total of £135.76.  The maths doesn't add up.

title: Twitch Streams Stop/Starting Issue Resolved!
text: I was getting random issues with streams on Twitch and the chat would reconnect constantly and stream would stop and start a lot. Only website I was having an issue with while using NordVPN. I was connected with Kyra and they were able to help me go through some troubleshooting steps I had not tried out yet and it turns out that all I needed to do was set the default VPN protocol to TCP instead of Auto and this cleared up my issue instantly. This makes sense as UDP is for speed and the sender does not care if the packets get received properly or not. TCP is stable as the received lets the sender know the packets were received successfully.

title: No need for tissues if you've got internet issues! Just use the Nord chat
text: Downloaded NordVPN this past week because I heard such good things and had a code for a discount. Ran into an issue using it on my computer with my phone acting as a hot spot. Could connect to the hot spot but got no internet. Tried a bunch of tips from Google over two days with no luck. Uninstalled Nord and was able to connect to the internet but I wanted a VPN as I am travelling abroad and I had heard such good things that I was willing to give them the benefit of the doubt. I'm sure glad I did. Connected with Bethany from Customer Services over Nord chat after emailing Nord about the issue. Bethany was very patient when I kept accidentally logging in and out of the chat, she was able to talk me through diagnosing the issue and she was able to help me fix it.  I now know what obfuscated servers are lol.  The good things I've heard about Nord were true - great customer service, speedy responses and good knowledge of their products and how to fix issues. Highly recommend!

title: Good support for a long-term client
text: I'm a NordVPN user for more than 3 years now, and recently I had an issue with automated subscription renewal which happened earlier than I expected and on unfavourable terms (1 year for a price exceeding my previous 3-year plan's price). I was going to change the subscription and buy a new one, but the money was charged 2 weeks before the subscription end date. I contacted support, and Tyrone helped me out real quick: not only it was okay for me to get a refund, but I received an offer of an additional free 18-months subscription (for long-term users). It was more beneficial for me than any existing plan, so I agreed. I hope to use Nord for many years to follow because I like the service itself, but I also really appreciate the attitude toward loyal customers. :)

title: Unable to pay for NordVPN
text: Unable to pay for NordVPN! This seems to be a common problem judging by posts elsewhere.  I had to message Nord via FBk to get a reply, and I was told to change browsers, clear cache and cookies etc. which I duly did - still the payment was refused by Nord.  I contacted my card company, twice, both times they couldn't even see the transaction. So clearly it hadn't been processed at the Nord end. Next I was told by Nord to try a different card! I gave up. No matter how 'good' the VPN is, if it's this hard to PAY them, what hope have you got if there's a problem afterwards?! I've bought the PROTON VPN instead! No problems there - easy peasy, job done :-)

title: NordVPN do not honor their word and refuse to admit fault - UPDATE
text: I have been a faithful NordVpn subscriber since 2018 and I decided to renew for 3 years in August 2021. After receiving confirmation for a 3 year subscription (I have the email and receipt to prove it), my service got canceled after 1 year and they are asking me to pay for another year. After many back and forth communications with their "Customer Success Team" (ticket #11679791), they refuse to re-establish my subscription and admit their mistake despite me having proof on paper that they renewed me for 3 years! On top of that, they have the gall to offer me a 2 year plan at a discount instead of honoring our agreement! I am hugely disappointed in NordVpn as I was previously satisfied with their services but this blunder totally disillusioned me. I don't even know if they care but they just lost a customer. UPDATE - Since I have written on Trustpilot, Nord VPN has finally admitted their fault and restored my service. Although I am grateful, it shouldn't have been so difficult to do so. Proof of purchase with the exact 3-year period shown should have been enough for them to reestablish my service without the back and forth for about a week.

title: Extremely Inconsistent
text: I am temporarily living in the UAE, and many internet services such as Discord calling/video calling are blocked here. As such, I bought a seemingly trustworthy and safe pick in NordVPN. Problem is that Nord only works around 30% of the time. Even when it does work, it randomly disconnects me. I used to be able to select a specific server I previously used, such as Singapore #377. In the new update, they removed this feature, and so if a previous server worked consistently for me, I used to be able to use the same specific server again, but now I can't do this. As of writing, NordVPN has not worked for me for the past 3 days straight, which was the tipping point for this review. I would love if Nord would bring back the ability to chose a specific server so that my issues can be dramatically alleviated.
